name: Oil Mogul (itch)
description:
Oil Mogul is now starting!

Lease land and search for oil. Create an efficient pipe network and extract the oil to store it in silos. Sell the oil at the best of times to maximize profits. Then buy essential upgrades in the City.

  • Dozens of upgrades and new tools to improve your oil production operations.
  • Meet the city characters in the saloon and give yourself up to gamblin

  • Buy land and use a scanner to search for oil.

  • Maximize your profits, increase your eficiency.

  • Outperform your competition

system requirement

win xp
cpu: intel Core i5
memory: 4GB Ram
directx 9.c
min 720p
